item.title: Code kata of the week
item.description: Here a collection of katas extracted from exercises and coding interviews. Kata 01 Source: Qualified.io Write a function that receives two strings and returns the number of characters we would need to rotate the first string forward to match the second. For instance, take the strings “fatigue” and “tiguefa”. In this case, the first string can be rotated 5 characters forward to produce the second string, so 5 would be returned.
